message: I really want to get into bed before the sun comes up somehow.
Tomorrow's probably gonna be a busy day again anyway, so if I don't get at least a little rest, my body won't last.
I lost even more time because of that guy called Nai.
At this hour, the woman might not be waiting for me anymore.
But what was that guy talking about, I wonder.
He talked like he knew me better than I knew myself. Even though we only met tonight for the first time, and it was just by chance.
Are Arkham and I connected by some kind of mysterious thread？
It feels like I'm sinking deeper and deeper before I even realize it.
I ended up coming back to the Fish Scale Inn......
I can't go to sleep just yet, can I? And I feel like I've already gone way past the time we promised, too.
It's as quiet as the grave around here.

If this were somewhere like a back alley in London, even at this kind of hour, there’s no way it would be completely silent-you’d hear the sound of cars driving down the street, or see prostitutes hurrying to find a customer and a place to sleep for the night, or something like that.
I can't just stand here staring forever.
Besides, the Fish Scale Inn itself isn't exactly what I'd call an impressive building that would catch my interest.
It stands there, insisting on its presence as if it's floating up from the darkness.
But the impression I get isn't anything like poetic or solemn-instead, it just looks like some creepy abandoned house.
The cold wind blowing around feels like it's gotten even harsher at night, and just standing here like this I can really feel my toes in my shoes about to freeze off.
Just staring like this, it feels like I'm gradually losing the energy to do anything crazy like go out somewhere now.
Maybe I should just go back to my room like this......
From the completely silent building, you can't even sense anyone inside. Honestly, you have to wonder if anyone actually lives there at all.

I'm honestly not sure if this door will still be open by the time I get back, but I can't exactly ask the lady of the house to lend me the front door key, so I don't have much choice but to hurry ahead without hesitating.
General store
Square
Ruins
Gilman House
Go inside
